mapper.select: SELECT l.line_no, i.interval_mark,lr.build_status, lr.left_or_right,re.num_value,re.warning_level, dic.dic_mean,dic.dic_unit FROM (select * from metro_line_interval where id=#{intervalId}) i INNER JOIN metro_line l ON i.line_id=l.id INNER JOIN metro_line_interval_lr lr ON i.id=lr.interval_id LEfT JOIN (SELECT r.* FROM metro_line_interval_warning_rec r WHERE r.interval_id=#{intervalId} AND r.warning_time>STR_TO_DATE(#{loginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND r.warning_time=( SELECT MAX(warning_time) FROM metro_line_interval_warning_rec r1 WHERE r1.interval_id=#{intervalId} AND r.left_or_right=r1.left_or_right) GROUP BY r.left_or_right ) re ON lr.interval_id=re.interval_id AND lr.left_or_right=re.left_or_right LEFT JOIN metro_dictionary dic ON re.param_name=dic_name
